item.title: Maya Protocol / Zcash
item.description: This document serves both as an introduction to the integration project of Zcash/ZEC into Maya Protocol (MP) and a technical feasibility study. In the first, we describe the architecture of MP and the workflows for deposit/withdraw and swap. Next, we’ll discuss how to add ZEC as a new chain which will allow the creation of the liquidity pool ZEC. We aim to have transparent & shielded ZEC available both as a source and a destination of a swap.
